name: Rhonda Cole
coverLetter: I have been trimming for 7 years and can usually trim a pound in 6 hours depending on the strain. I have also done harvesting, bucking and transplanting. I am looking near the Portland Oregon area and can work part or full time. I have my olcc card. I am willing to travel if there is a place to pitch a tent with vegetarian meals provided. Looking for good vibes!
